title: What is the best presentation ever? - Quora

response.answer_text: Good question and obviously answers are going to be quite subjective but here is my take on some of the best presentations ever which we can all learn from http://graduatecareertips.co.uk/2011/11/04/what-makes-a-great-presentation/1. Daniel Hannan2. Kennedy3. Al Pacino

Easily, it is Karen Owen's Duke University PowerPoint in which she describes her sexual exploits with various Duke athletes and provides a rating for each of them.    She's funny, a good writer and has great material to work with.
